resources.string: The contact you chose has more than one phone number.\nPlease select a default number. You will only have to do that once.

Welcome to QuickConn.
This app displays a list of your starred contacts and lets you contact them quickly. To choose a default phone number, just touch and hold the desired contact.
A long press on the search button will also launch this app and let you contact people faster.
Enjoy.
If you like this app, please consider donating on my website or buying the donation app on the Market. Thanks.
Thank you for supporting my work!
No phone numbers for this contact
Only one phone number for this contact
